t: Matthew 28
Jesus Is Risen!
Now*p after the Sabbath, as it began to dawn toward the first day*i of the week, Mary Magdalene and the other Mary came to look at the grave.
And behold, a severe earthquake had occurred, for an angel of the Lord descended from heaven and came and rolled away the stone and sat upon it.
And his appearance was like lightning, and his clothing as white as snow.
The guards shook for fear of him and became like dead men.
The angel said to the women, “Do not be afraid; for I know that you are looking for Jesus who has been crucified.
He is not here, for He has risen, just as He said. Come, see the place where He was lying.
Go quickly and tell His disciples that He has risen from the dead; and behold, He is going ahead of you into Galilee, there you will see Him; behold, I have told you.”
And*p they left the tomb quickly with fear and great joy and ran to report it to His disciples.
And behold, Jesus met them and greeted them. And they came up and took hold of His feet and worshiped Him.
Then Jesus said to them, “Do*r not*r be*r afraid;*r go*r and*r take*r word*r to*r My*r brethren*r to*r leave*r for*r Galilee,*r and*r there*r they*r will*r see*r Me.”*r
Now*p while they were on their way, some of the guard came into the city and reported to the chief priests all that had happened.
And when they had assembled with the elders and consulted together, they gave a large sum of money to the soldiers,
and said, “You are to say, ‘His disciples came by night and stole Him away while we were asleep.’
And if this should come to the governor’s ears, we will win him over and keep you out of trouble.”
And they took the money and did as they had been instructed; and this story was widely spread among the Jews, and*i is*i to this day.
The Great Commission
But*p the eleven disciples proceeded to Galilee, to the mountain which Jesus had designated.
When they saw Him, they worshiped Him;*i but some were doubtful.
And Jesus came up and spoke to them, saying, “All*r authority*r has*r been*r given*r to*r Me*r in*r heaven*r and*r on*r earth.*r
Go*r therefore*r and*r make*r disciples*r of*r all*r the*r nations,*r baptizing*r them*r in*r the*r name*r of*r the*r Father*r and*r the*r Son*r and*r the*r Holy*r Spirit,*r
teaching*r them*r to*r observe*r all*r that*r I*r commanded*r you;*r and*r lo,*r I*r am*r with*r you*r always,*r even*r to*r the*r end*r of*r the*r age.”*r
